sections.name: Preparation
sections.description: This phase involves tasks necessary to set up the resources and data for LLM development.

selection_options.name: Data collection
selection_options.description: Focus on identifying diverse, high-quality data sources and ensuring they align with the LLM’s purpose.

selection_options.name: Data curation
selection_options.description: Enhancing data quality through cleaning, categorization, and transformation.

selection_options.name: Data storage
selection_options.description: Ensure accessible and secure data storage solutions with strong security measures.

selection_options.name: Resource provisioning
selection_options.description: Select appropriate compute and cloud resources optimized for LLM development.

selection_options.name: Team and expertise
selection_options.description: Ensure a skilled team of data scientists, engineers, linguists, and ethicists.

sections.name: Development
sections.description: The process of designing and training the LLM.

selection_options.name: Design
selection_options.description: Choose model architecture, hyperparameters, and evaluation metrics.

selection_options.name: Training
selection_options.description: Iteratively train the model using curated data and monitor its performance.

selection_options.name: Guardrails
selection_options.description: Implement safety mechanisms to prevent harmful content generation.

sections.name: Evaluation/Validation
sections.description: Assess and test the model’s performance.

selection_options.name: Evaluation
selection_options.description: Use metrics and benchmarks to assess the model’s performance and fairness.

selection_options.name: Validation/Red Teaming
selection_options.description: Test the model in real-world scenarios to evaluate its generalization capabilities.

selection_options.name: Re-evaluation
selection_options.description: Monitor the model’s performance post-deployment and retrain if necessary.

sections.name: Deployment
sections.description: Managing the operational deployment of the model.

selection_options.name: Orchestration
selection_options.description: Package the LLM for deployment and ensure it can scale efficiently.

selection_options.name: AI Services supply chain
selection_options.description: Ensure secure interaction between the LLM and external components.

selection_options.name: AI applications
selection_options.description: Develop APIs and integrate retrieval-augmented generation techniques.

sections.name: Delivery
sections.description: Managing the operational aspects of the deployed model.

selection_options.name: Operations
selection_options.description: Track the LLM’s performance and handle incidents.

selection_options.name: Maintenance
selection_options.description: Address bugs, apply security updates, and retrain as needed.

selection_options.name: Continuous monitoring
selection_options.description: Ongoing scrutiny of the LLM’s performance and security.

selection_options.name: Continuous improvement
selection_options.description: Regularly evaluate and improve the model’s performance.

sections.name: Service Retirement
sections.description: Phasing out the LLM’s operational lifecycle.

selection_options.name: Archiving
selection_options.description: Preserve the LLM model and its associated documentation for future use.

selection_options.name: Data deletion
selection_options.description: Ensure secure deletion of sensitive data in compliance with regulations.

selection_options.name: Model disposal
selection_options.description: Assess whether the LLM or its components can be reused or securely disposed of.
